subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
Surgery and Surgeons
lead_paragraph: The Yankees’ Masahiro Tanaka is trying to beat a partial tear in the ulnar collateral ligament, but Kris Medlen and Ryan Madson are examples of pitchers who had arm surgery with varying outcomes.
snippet: The Yankees’ Masahiro Tanaka is trying to beat a partial tear in the ulnar collateral ligament, but Kris Medlen and Ryan Madson are examples of pitchers who had arm surgery with varying outcomes.
